Sentencas: In this paper we report the successful incorporation of high valence transition metals, i.e. Cr, Mo, W, V. Nb, Ti, Zr into SrFeO3-delta perovskite materials, for potential applications as symmetric electrode materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: High valence transition metal doped strontium ferrites for electrode materials in symmetrical SOFCs

Sentencas: It is observed that the doping leads to a change from an orthorhombic structure (with partial ordering of oxygen vacancies) to a cubic one (with the oxygen vacancies disordered).
Titulo: High valence transition metal doped strontium ferrites for electrode materials in symmetrical SOFCs

Sentencas: These electrodes are chemically compatibles with Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (CGO) and La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-delta (LSGM) electrolytes at least up to 1100 degrees C. Thermal annealing experiments in 5% H-2-Ar at 800 degrees C also show the stability of the doped samples in reducing conditions, suggesting that they may be suitable for both cathode and anode applications.
Titulo: High valence transition metal doped strontium ferrites for electrode materials in symmetrical SOFCs

Sentencas: In contrast, reduction of undoped SrFeO3-delta leads to the observation of extra peaks indicating the formation of the brownmillerite structure with the associated oxygen vacancy ordering.
Titulo: High valence transition metal doped strontium ferrites for electrode materials in symmetrical SOFCs

Sentencas: The performance of these electrodes was examined on dense electrolyte pellets of CGO and LSGM in air and 5% H-2-Ar.
Titulo: High valence transition metal doped strontium ferrites for electrode materials in symmetrical SOFCs

Sentencas: In both atmospheres an improvement in the area specific resistances (ASR) values is observed for the doped samples with respect to the parent compound.
Titulo: High valence transition metal doped strontium ferrites for electrode materials in symmetrical SOFCs

Sentencas: Thus, the results show that high valence transition metals can be incorporated into SrFeO3-delta-based materials and can have a beneficial effect on the electrochemical performance, making them potentially suitable for use as cathode and anode materials in symmetrical SOFC.
Titulo: High valence transition metal doped strontium ferrites for electrode materials in symmetrical SOFCs
